submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        dit = dict()
        for i in range(n):
            dit[i+1] = i
        ans = []
        total = n - 1
        for x,y in queries:
            # print(x,y,dit)
            p = dit[y]
            if p > x:
                cnt = 0
                while p != x:
                    cnt += 1
                    # print(p)
                    if p in dit:
                        temp = dit[p]
                        dit[p] = x
                        p = temp
                    else:
                        break
                dit[y] = x
                total -= cnt
                
            # if p > x:
            #     dit[y] = x
            #     total -= (p-x)
            ans.append(total)
        return ans
